source.name: Dungeon Master's Guide (2024)
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description:
Weave fantastic adventures with the 2024 Dungeon Master's Guide!
Create thrilling adventures with this revised and expanded Dungeon Master's Guide for fifth edition Dungeons & Dragons. Inside this essential guide is everything new and experienced Dungeon Masters need to weave epic tales, build fantastical worlds, and inspire memorable moments for your party. It includes:
• Dungeon Master essentials for all experience levels • Greyhawk as a customizable, ready-to-use campaign setting • New Bastions system • 400+ Magic Items, 15 versatile maps, 50+ Lore Entries
